author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
0.4.1  2024-02-20 kkossev  - (dev.branch) added illuminance cluster support (Aqara T1 Light Sensor); the FeatureMap of each supported cluster is stored in the state figngerprint variable; The bundle is made available on HPM; bugfix: colorName was sent wrongly in the event description for CT bulbs; bugFix: Hue bridge colorName bug fix; note: PhilipsHue does not report colorMode change back when changed from another system!; note: Aqara LED Strip T1 colorMode reporting is wrong! 
v 0.4.0 - first version available in HPM
